snippet: A new state system will include teachers of subjects that are not typically evaluated.
abstract: New York State Education Dept announces that teacher evaluation system will soon include assessments for subjects not typically evaluated, including art, gym and foreign languages.
lead_paragraph: A new state system will include teachers of subjects that are not typically evaluated.

headline.seo: New York State Teacher Assessments Extending to Art and Gym
headline.main: Teacher Assessments Extending to Art and Gym
headline.print_headline: Teacher Assessments Extending to Art and Gym
